articles.description: Simone Biles says it was "just the right thing to do" after she and team-mate Jordan Chiles bowed down to Olympic gold medallist Rebeca Andrade after the floor final.
articles.title: Simone Biles praises 'queen' Rebeca Andrade after iconic medal moment at Paris 2024

articles.description: Emma Finucane, Sophie Capewell and Katy Marchant kick-start the medal charge in the Paris velodrome by winning Great Britain’s first Olympic women’s team sprint gold.
articles.title: Olympics track cycling: Great Britain win women's team sprint gold

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Great Britain win a third triathlon medal at the Paris 2024 Olympics on Monday after a dramatic finish to the mixed relay.
articles.title: Paris 2024: Simone Biles, Molly Caudery, Keely Hodgkinson, plus GB win third triathlon medal

articles.description: Sweden's Armand Duplantis set a new world record of 6.25m after winning gold in men's pole vault.
articles.title: Paris Olympics 2024: Duplantis breaks pole vault world record on way to gold

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from France U23 vs Egypt U23 in the Olympics
articles.title: France U23 vs Egypt U23: Olympics - BBC Sport

articles.description: Noah Lyles won Olympic men's 100m gold by five-thousandths of a second at Paris 2024 in a dramatic final which proved the fastest race in history.
articles.title: Olympics men's 100m final: How Noah Lyles won the greatest race in history

articles.description: Andrew Flintoff reveals his struggle with anxiety, nightmares and flashbacks after the accident which he says "changed my life forever".
articles.title: Andrew Flintoff reveals 'anxiety, nightmares and flashbacks' of Top Gear crash

articles.description: Graham Thorpe was part of the England set-up for almost 30 years and, after his death aged 55, will be remembered as one of the best players of his generation.
articles.title: Graham Thorpe: England & Surrey great dies at 55 - one of best batters of his generation
